title: Add a New Product to the Store
description: A merchandiser needs to add a brand new product to the e-commerce platform.

tasks.description: Create a new product entry with its SKU, name, description, price, and specifications.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully populates all required fields for the new product.

tasks.description: Upload product images and assign them to the new product entry.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent uploads and correctly links images to the product.

tasks.description: Assign the product to the appropriate categories and set its initial inventory level.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly categorizes the product and sets its stock.
